title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - BG - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Bunge Ltd. (Symbol: BG) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $54.34, changing hands as high as $55.73 per share. Bunge Ltd. shares are currently trading up about 2.9% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
